text: Pavetta intermedia is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is found in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Uganda. ==Sources== * Makerere University Institute of Environment and Natural Resources 1998. Pavetta intermedia. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. intermedia Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pavetta intermedia
